alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Major; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:50AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dewey, western Major and southeastern Woodward Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 650 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Mutual to 5 miles west of Putnam. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taloga, Seiling, Vici, Oakwood, Mutual, Putnam, Chester, Orion, Cestos, western Canton Lake, Hucmac and Bouse Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
